reviewText: I've got several of these "Wild Party Girl" DVDs, and I'd rate this as one of the better ones. The camera crew goes to various locations, mostly at dance clubs, in cars, and in the street to film girls in their late teens and early 20s flashing the camera. There are lots of sexy girls on here, showing lots of T & A and a little bit of total nudity. None of the totally nude girls tries to show everything, but because of all the toplessness, this is a Breast Lovers Paradise!! Camerawork is quite good, sometimes full screen and sometimes widescreen. The "Wild Party Girls" DVDs have a tendency to do some irritating image manipulation, like split screens, switching back and forth from color to B & W, slo-mo and rapid speed, etc., and there's a moderate amount of that going on here, but thankfully on this one they usually refrain from that stuff. Sound is usually live. One of the really cute girls named Michelle is on here repeatedly, and she loves to show us her hot bod, especially her big Melons. She's the superstar of "Wild Party Girls," so she has enlivened several of their DVDs, notably this one and also Wild Party Girls: Naked Spring Break Also, there is LOTS of caressing and licking of topless ladies going on here, including at the dance clubs, so I wonder where the heck that is legal in public?? Not around where I live!! The last scene is a striptease contest at a club, where 4 or 5 nice looking girls get topless a lot but keep on thongs. Run time is 56 minutes, and the bonus is a good 3-minute slideshow of some of the best shots from the DVD. "Wild Party Girls: VIP Parties" is a hot one!!
Wild Party Girls: VIP Parties Uncensored is okay. There's nothing really that wild on the DVD. But there is a cute girl with huge boobs on here. And she show those puppies off a number of times.
